data.title: Salman Rushdie and Padma Lakshmi headed for divorce
data.meta_description: Salman Rushdie and Padma Lakshmi tied the knot on April 17, 2004, in Manhattan • So the high-profile Salman Rushdie-Padma Lakshmi marriage is fin.
data.text:
• So the high-profile Salman Rushdie-Padma Lakshmi marriage is finally on the rocks after just three years! The couple could not even endure the 7-year itch, to say the least. I had an inkling that the marriage was doomed right from the beginning. Rushdie is an intellectual and Padma Lakshmi is a former model and a very ambitious TV presenter. She must have been unable to remain in his shadow for a long time. Their marriage has been under strain for quite some time due to their conflicting interests. This was bound to happen. Anyway, I wish Padma all the best in her career and Rushdie, well, looks like he’ll soon become an eligible bachelor all over again!

http://wouldyoublogme.blogspot.com/2007/04/another-divorce.html

• I just read in the papers that Salman Rushdie and the hot Padma Lakshmi are headed for a divorce. Lucky girl! She’s likely to go laughing to the bank after it comes through. And then there’s her cookery show Top Chef by which she can ensure a steady flow of the greens. As for their marriage — the writing was on the wall when they tied the knot three years back! Such a huge age difference is bound to come in the way. Especially when both of them are achievers in their own way. I just hope that their divorce proceedings don’t become ugly like the Heather Mills and Paul McCartney split.

http://meiran.livejournal.com/848910.html?view=2217230#t2217230
